price: 19. “Eet en drink in vreugde vanwege wat jullie gedaan hebben.”
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
